actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend title I of the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 to exempt from preemption under such title certain provisions of the law of the State of Washington relating to health plans.
short_title: Washington State Health Services Reform Enabling Act of 1993

summary.text: Washington State Health Services Reform Enabling Act of 1993 - Amends the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 (ERISA) to exempt from preemption under provisions for protection of employee benefit rights certain provisions of the law of the State of Washington relating to health plans.

titles.title: Washington State Health Services Reform Enabling Act of 1993

A bill to amend title I of the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 to exempt from preemption under such title certain provisions of the law of the State of Washington relating to health plans.
